text: Spain national volleyball team is the national volleyball team of Spain. On 16 September 2007 the team won the European title. That is the best result reached by the team in his history. == Honors == * European Championship: Gold medal (2007) * European League: Gold Medal (2007) - Silver medal (2009, 2010, 2011) - Bronze medal (2005, 2012) == References == * www.rfevb.com - Spain Volleyball Federation (Real Federación Española de Voleibol - RFEVB) Category:National volleyball teams Category:Sports organizations of Spain
title: Spain men's national volleyball team
